courseDetails.title: Unlock Leadership Success with 'Praise and Raise' Method
courseDetails.shortDescription: The innovative educational method "Praise and Raise" draws out employees' talents and fosters growth.
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Praise and Raise" is a proven management method from Japan, already adopted by over 600 companies. In this course, you will learn how to use this practical approach to boost employee motivation, enhance productivity, and create a positive work environment.


The course focuses on two key areas: effective praise and clear communication of expectations. You’ll learn how to praise effort and process, not just results, which encourages a growth mindset and builds self-confidence in your team. Instead of reprimanding employees, you’ll discover how to communicate expectations in a way that motivates improvement and promotes long-term success.


You’ll also learn how to observe and identify your team’s strengths and talents, using the "Praise Sheet (Ho-Me Sheet)" to highlight positive behaviors and foster continuous feedback. This helps create a cycle of ongoing improvement and drives consistent performance. Additionally, you'll explore how to tailor praise to different individuals to ensure it resonates and inspires them to reach new heights, fostering a culture of excellence and engagement.


There’s no special preparation required, so this method can be easily implemented by anyone, regardless of your company’s size or industry. By the end of this course, you'll be ready to unlock your team’s potential and boost overall workplace success.
targetAudiences: For those struggling with team development or preparing to lead a team

courseDetails.title: Certificat Professionnel en Gestion des Risques
courseDetails.shortDescription: Risques, gestion des risques, définitions et concepts, risques stratégiques, financiers, opérationnels et de conformité.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenue au programme : Certificat Professionnel en Gestion des Risques par le MTF Institute

Cours fourni par le MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.

MTF est un institut éducatif et de recherche global basé à Lisbonne, Portugal, axé sur l'éducation hybride (en présentiel et en ligne) pour les professionnels et les entreprises dans des domaines tels que : la Gestion des Entreprises, la Science et la Technologie, la Banque et la Finance.

Le centre de R&D de MTF se concentre sur des activités de recherche dans des domaines tels que : l'Intelligence Artificielle, l'Apprentissage Automatique, la Science des Données, le Big Data, le WEB3, la Blockchain, les Cryptomonnaies et les Actifs Numériques, les Métavers, la Transformation Numérique, la Fintech, le Commerce Électronique et l'Internet des Objets.

MTF est partenaire officiel de : IBM, Intel, Microsoft, et membre de la Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie Portugaise.

MTF est présent dans 216 pays et a été choisi par plus de 740 000 étudiants.



Autrice du cours :

La Dr. Alex Amoroso est une professionnelle expérimentée avec une vaste expérience dans les domaines académique et industriel, spécialisée dans les méthodologies de recherche, la formulation de stratégies et le développement de produits. Titulaire d'un doctorat à l'École des Sciences Sociales et Politiques à Lisbonne, Portugal, où elle a été honorée pour sa recherche exemplaire, Alex Amoroso apporte une grande expertise et expérience.

En plus de ses études doctorales, Mme Amoroso a été professeure invitée, dispensant des cours à un large éventail d'étudiants, de la licence aux étudiants en affaires dans des cours professionnels et exécutifs. Actuellement, à l'EIMT à Zurich, Suisse, elle enseigne aux étudiants en doctorat, offrant un enseignement avancé sur la conception de recherches et les méthodologies, et au MTF Institute, Mme Amoroso dirige le domaine académique du Développement de Produits.

En combinant l'expérience académique et professionnelle, Mme Amoroso a obtenu de grands résultats dans sa carrière en dirigeant des activités de R&D, de développement de produits, de stratégie et d'analyse de marché dans divers secteurs. Elle a mis en œuvre les meilleures pratiques du marché dans des industries telles que la Banque et la Finance, le PropTech, le Conseil et la Recherche, ainsi que dans des Startups Innovantes.

La production scientifique d’Alex Amoroso est vaste et comprend de nombreux articles publiés dans des revues scientifiques reconnues ainsi que des présentations orales et des affiches lors de conférences internationales. Ses travaux de recherche ont été présentés dans des institutions de renom telles que l'École des Sciences Politiques et Sociales et la Conférence Stressed Out à UCL, entre autres.

Passionnée par la collaboration interdisciplinaire et déterminée à impulser un changement positif, Alex Amoroso est dédiée à la formation des étudiants et des professionnels dans l'utilisation de méthodologies de pointe pour atteindre l'excellence dans le monde des affaires global.


Khadija M'tag, traductrice du programme, possède une solide expérience en finance, en formation et en traduction professionnelle. Elle a participé à plusieurs projets financiers, animé des formations, et travaille actuellement avec des clients internationaux à qui elle apporte son expertise.


Dans un environnement commercial en constante évolution et de plus en plus complexe, la capacité à anticiper, évaluer et gérer les risques est devenue une compétence indispensable pour toute organisation souhaitant assurer sa pérennité et atteindre ses objectifs stratégiques. Notre cours complet sur la Gestion des Risques vous offre les connaissances fondamentales et les outils pratiques nécessaires pour naviguer avec succès dans ce paysage incertain.

Ce programme est conçu pour vous doter d'une compréhension approfondie et d'une maîtrise pratique des diverses facettes de la gestion des risques :

  • Introduction aux Fondamentaux : Vous débuterez par une compréhension approfondie de ce qu'est un risque, ses différentes typologies (stratégiques, opérationnels, financiers, de conformité, de réputation) et l'importance cruciale d'une approche proactive. Nous explorerons les processus clés et les avantages d'une gestion des risques efficace, y compris les concepts d'appétit et de tolérance au risque, et l'impact d'une culture du risque positive.

  • Identification et Évaluation Précise : Découvrez les techniques systématiques pour identifier les risques potentiels (brainstorming, analyse SWOT, scénarios, données historiques). Vous apprendrez ensuite à évaluer la probabilité d'occurrence et l'impact potentiel de chaque risque, en utilisant des outils comme les matrices de risques pour une hiérarchisation efficace et une documentation rigoureuse.

  • Cadres et Processus Structurés : Explorez les cadres de référence reconnus mondialement comme COSO ERM, ISO 31000 et NIST, qui fournissent des principes et des lignes directrices pour une gestion cohérente. Vous comprendrez l'importance des processus bien définis et comment intégrer la gestion des risques dans la planification stratégique, la prise de décision et les opérations quotidiennes de votre organisation.

  • Stratégies de Traitement et d'Atténuation : Maîtrisez les quatre grandes options de traitement des risques – l'évitement, l'atténuation, le transfert et l'acceptation. Le cours détaillera l'élaboration de plans de traitement des risques et la mise en place de contrôles efficaces (préventifs, détectives, correctifs), tout en abordant le concept crucial de risque résiduel.

  • Gestion des Risques Spécifiques : Plongez dans les spécificités de la Gestion du Risque Opérationnel (erreurs humaines, défaillances systèmes, perturbations de la chaîne d'approvisionnement), du Risque Financier (risque de marché, de crédit, de liquidité) et du Risque de Cybersécurité (malware, phishing, violations de données). Chaque section inclura des exemples concrets et les meilleures pratiques sectorielles pour une application pertinente.

  • Risques Émergents et Tendances Futures : Anticipez les défis de demain en identifiant les risques émergents liés au changement climatique, aux instabilités géopolitiques, aux perturbations de la chaîne d'approvisionnement et aux nouvelles technologies (Intelligence Artificielle, Internet des Objets). Découvrez comment les tendances comme l'intégration des risques, la résilience organisationnelle et les considérations ESG (Environnementales, Sociales et de Gouvernance) façonnent l'avenir de la gestion des risques.

  • Gouvernance, Conformité et Reporting : Comprenez le rôle essentiel de la gouvernance des risques, le rôle du conseil d'administration et de la direction, l'importance de la conformité aux réglementations et normes (ex: RGPD, Bâle III), et les meilleures pratiques de reporting pour assurer la transparence et la responsabilité à tous les niveaux de l'organisation.

  • Éthique et Standards Professionnels : Abordez les principes éthiques fondamentaux et les normes professionnelles (tels que ceux de la GARP) qui sont le pilier d'une pratique responsable et intègre de la gestion des risques. Vous apprendrez à naviguer dans les dilemmes éthiques et à cultiver une culture éthique forte au sein de votre organisation.


En complétant ce programme, vous serez mieux équipé pour prendre des décisions éclairées, protéger la valeur de votre entreprise et transformer les défis en opportunités.

Rejoignez-nous et devenez un acteur clé de la sécurité et de la réussite de votre organisation !
targetAudiences: Professionnels de la finance et de la comptabilité

courseDetails.title: Operations and Process Management Data Analysis & Analytics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Data Analysis and Analytics best practices in Operations and Process Management, Operational Management and Improvements
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Certificate: Operations and Process Management Data Analysis & Analytics by MTF Institute


This course equips participants with the essential skills to transform operational data into actionable insights. It emphasizes the strategic role of data in modern operations, guiding learners through the process of identifying, cleaning, and analyzing crucial data sources. Participants will master a range of techniques, from basic statistical analysis and KPI development to advanced predictive modeling and machine learning applications, enabling them to optimize processes, forecast performance, and drive data-driven decision-making.

Through practical exercises and real-world applications, students will learn to utilize industry-standard tools and software to visualize and interpret operational data. The curriculum covers vital methodologies like root cause analysis, process mapping, and variance analysis, empowering them to identify inefficiencies and implement targeted improvements. Furthermore, the course delves into advanced topics such as scenario planning, linear programming for resource allocation, and statistical process control, preparing participants to develop robust data-driven strategies and effectively manage change within operational environments.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 216 countries and has been chosen by more than 740 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Operations and Process Management - Data Analysis & Analytics


This program provides a comprehensive journey into the world of data analysis and its application within operations and process management. It equips participants with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills necessary to extract valuable insights from data, drive informed decision-making, and optimize operational efficiency. The curriculum is structured into four key sections: Data Analysis, Hands-on Experience, and Data Analysis in Operations.


Section 2: Data Analysis (Lectures 3-17)

This section lays the foundation for data analysis by introducing fundamental concepts and methodologies. Participants will gain a thorough understanding of the data analysis lifecycle, from data acquisition to interpretation and reporting. Key topics include:

  • Introduction to Data Analysis: Defining data analysis, its importance, and its role in various industries.

  • Data Collection and Acquisition: Exploring various data sources and methods for collecting relevant data.

  • Data Cleaning and Preparation: Learning techniques for handling missing values, outliers, and inconsistencies to ensure data quality.

  • Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Discovering patterns, trends, and relationships in data through summary statistics and visualizations.

  • Statistical Analysis: Applying statistical methods to test hypotheses, draw inferences, and quantify uncertainty.

  • Data Visualization: Creating effective visualizations to communicate insights and facilitate understanding.

  • Predictive Analytics: Building models to forecast future outcomes and make predictions.

  • Data Interpretation and Reporting: Translating analysis results into actionable insights and communicating them effectively.

  • Data Privacy and Ethics: Understanding ethical considerations and best practices for handling sensitive data.

  • Tools and Software for Data Analysis: Introduction to popular tools and software used in data analysis.

  • Building a Data Analyst Portfolio: Strategies for showcasing skills and experience to potential employers.

  • Career Development and Job Market Trends: Exploring career paths and industry trends in data analysis.

  • Practical Exercises: Reinforcing theoretical concepts with hands-on exercises.

  • Next Steps: Guidance on continued learning and career advancement.


Section 3: Hands-on Experience (Lectures 18-29)

This section provides practical experience with industry-standard tools and technologies used in data analysis. Participants will apply their knowledge to real-world scenarios and develop proficiency in:

  • Excel: Performing data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using Excel.

  • SQL: Retrieving and analyzing data from relational databases using SQL queries.

  • Python: Utilizing Python libraries such as Pandas and NumPy for data analysis and manipulation.

  • R: Conducting statistical analysis and creating visualizations with the R programming language.

  • Tableau: Creating interactive dashboards and visualizations for data exploration and communication.

  • Practical Tasks and Exercises: Hands-on exercises utilizing the above mentioned tools to analyze and visualize real world data.

  • Next Steps: guidance on how to continue to develop skills with these tools.


Section 4: Data Analysis in Operations (Lectures 30-58)

This section focuses on the application of data analysis techniques to optimize operational processes and improve decision-making. Participants will learn how to:

  • Understand the Role of Data in Modern Operations: Exploring the importance of data-driven decision-making in operations management.

  • Apply Foundational Concepts of Data Analysis: Utilizing data analysis principles to address operational challenges.

  • Utilize Tools and Software for Operational Data Analysis: Selecting and applying appropriate tools for specific operational tasks.

  • Identify and Utilize Data Sources in Operations: Recognizing relevant data sources within operational systems.

  • Clean and Preprocess Operational Data: Ensuring data quality for accurate analysis.

  • Integrate and Transform Operational Data: Combining data from multiple sources for comprehensive analysis.

  • Employ Data Collection Methods: Choosing appropriate data collection techniques for operational data.

  • Create Derived Metrics and KPIs: Developing key performance indicators to measure operational performance.

  • Visualize Operational Data: Creating effective visualizations to communicate operational insights.

  • Analyze Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): Monitoring and analyzing KPIs to identify areas for improvement.

  • Apply Basic Statistical Analysis for Operations: Using statistical methods to analyze operational data.

  • Conduct Root Cause Analysis: Identifying the underlying causes of operational problems.

  • Perform Process Analysis and Improvement: Optimizing operational processes through data analysis.

  • Conduct Variance Analysis: Analyzing deviations from planned performance.

  • Utilize Flowcharts and Process Mapping: Visualizing and analyzing operational processes.

  • Apply Forecasting Techniques: Predicting future operational performance.

  • Develop Predictive Models in Operations: Building models to forecast demand, predict equipment failures, and optimize resource allocation.

  • Conduct Scenario Planning and Simulation: Evaluating the impact of different operational scenarios.

  • Apply Regression Analysis for Forecasting: Using regression models to predict future values.

  • Implement Statistical Process Control (SPC): Monitoring and controlling process variability.

  • Utilize Optimization Techniques: Finding optimal solutions for resource allocation and scheduling.

  • Apply Machine Learning in Operations: Utilizing machine learning algorithms for tasks such as predictive maintenance and quality control.

  • Apply Linear Programming for Resource Allocation: Optimizing resource allocation through linear programming techniques.

  • Develop Data-Driven Strategies: Formulating operational strategies based on data insights.

  • Manage Change and Communication: Effectively communicating data-driven insights and facilitating change management.



The Role of Data in Modern Operations

The Power of Data in Operations:

  • Data-driven decisions: Key to operational success.

  • Enhance efficiency, reduce costs, boost quality.

  • Gain competitive advantage through insights.


Key Operational Areas for Data Analysis:

  • Supply Chain: Optimise logistics, reduce delays.

  • Production: Improve output, minimise waste.

  • Service: Enhance customer satisfaction, predict demand.

  • Inventory Management: reduce stock-outs, and overstocking.


Operations and Process Management Data Analysis & Analytics involves using data and analytical techniques to optimize and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of an organization's operational processes. Here's a breakdown:


What it is:

  • Operations Management:

    • Focuses on planning, organizing, and supervising production, manufacturing, or service delivery.

    • Aims to maximize efficiency and minimize costs while maintaining quality.

  • Process Management:

    • Involves designing, controlling, and improving business processes.

    • Seeks to streamline workflows and eliminate bottlenecks.

  • Data Analysis & Analytics:

    • Utilizes statistical methods, data mining, and machine learning to extract meaningful insights from data.

    • Enables data-driven decision-making.

    • In the context of operation and process management, this invloves analyzing data related to production, supply chains, customer service, and other operational areas.

    • Key types of analytics used are:

      • Descriptive Analytics: Understanding what has happened.

      • Predictive Analytics: Forecasting future trends.

      • Prescriptive Analytics: Recommending optimal actions.


Importance for Companies:

  • Improved Efficiency:

    • Data analysis can identify inefficiencies and bottlenecks in processes, leading to streamlined operations.

  • Cost Reduction:

    • By optimizing resource allocation and reducing waste, companies can significantly lower operational costs.

  • Enhanced Decision-Making:

    • Data-driven insights enable managers to make informed decisions, leading to better outcomes.

  • Increased Productivity:

    • Optimized processes and resource allocation result in higher productivity and output.

  • Better Quality Control:

    • Data analysis helps monitor quality in real-time, allowing for proactive identification and resolution of issues.

  • Supply Chain Optimization:

    • Data analytics assists with inventory management, demand forecasting, and logistics, leading to a more efficient supply chain.


Importance for Managers' Careers:

  • Enhanced Skills:

    • Developing data analysis and analytics skills makes managers more valuable assets to their organizations.

  • Career Advancement:

    • Proficiency in these areas opens up opportunities for career advancement into higher-level management roles.

  • Increased Efficacy:

    • Managers with these skills are able to make better informed decisions, leading to better results, and therefore increased efficacy in their roles.

  • Competitive Advantage:

    • In today's data-driven business world, these skills provide a significant competitive advantage.

  • Future-Proofing:

    • As businesses increasingly rely on data, these skills are essential for staying relevant and successful in the long term.


In essence, Operations and Process Management Data Analysis & Analytics empowers companies and managers to make smarter, more efficient decisions, driving success in an increasingly competitive business landscape.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Operations, business and Data Analysis

courseDetails.title: Learn Canva from Basic to Advanced and Earn Money in 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn graphic design using canva from scratch and create professional designs for social media, ads, t-shirts, books.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to unlock your creative potential and master the art of graphic design with Canva?

Welcome to ‘Master Canva: From Basics to Advanced + Monetize Your Skills’, a comprehensive, step-by-step course designed to transform you from a beginner into a Canva expert. Whether you’re a complete novice, a business owner, a freelancer, or a seasoned designer looking to expand your skill set, this course will empower you to create stunning designs for personal, professional, and creative purposes—all while teaching you how to turn your newfound skills into a reliable income stream.

Why Learn Canva?

Graphic design is no longer a luxury—it’s a necessity in today’s visually-driven world. Canva has revolutionized the way we create by making design accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise. With its intuitive interface, extensive library of templates, and powerful features, Canva has become a go-to tool for individuals and businesses alike.

This course goes beyond teaching you how to use Canva. It equips you with the knowledge to craft professional-grade designs for various platforms, including social media, print, merchandise, and publishing. Most importantly, you’ll discover proven strategies to monetize your Canva expertise, helping you earn money from your designs.

What You’ll Learn in This Course

1. Master the Basics of Canva
We start with the fundamentals. You’ll learn how to set up your Canva account, navigate the interface, and use its essential tools. By understanding Canva’s dashboard, templates, and design options, you’ll be ready to start creating in no time.

2. Explore Canva’s Advanced Tools and Features
Once you’ve mastered the basics, we’ll dive deeper. You’ll explore advanced features like text effects, photo editing, layering, and custom templates. You’ll learn how to use grids, frames, and gradients to enhance your designs, ensuring they stand out from the crowd.

3. Create Stunning Designs for Every Purpose
This course covers a wide range of projects, including:

  • Eye-catching YouTube thumbnails to boost click-through rates.

  • Engaging social media posts for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.

  • Professional book covers and interior templates for Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP).

  • Custom t-shirt designs perfect for merchandising.

  • Ads, banners, and event promotions that drive results.

With step-by-step guidance and practical projects, you’ll build a versatile portfolio showcasing your skills.

4. Monetize Your Canva Skills
Graphic design is not just a skill—it’s a lucrative opportunity. This course teaches you how to turn your Canva expertise into a source of income. You’ll learn to:

  • Use LinkedIn effectively to showcase your designs and attract clients.

  • Tap into freelance platforms and other earning opportunities.

  • Build and sell your own Canva templates, graphics, and design services.

5. Gain Confidence and Build Your Creative Portfolio
Throughout the course, you’ll work on hands-on projects that allow you to apply your knowledge in real-world scenarios. By the end, you’ll have a diverse portfolio that highlights your expertise and boosts your confidence as a designer.

What Sets This Course Apart?

Step-by-Step Learning: Each module is carefully structured to ensure you learn at your own pace. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, you’ll find value in every lesson.

Real-World Applications: This course focuses on practical, actionable skills. You won’t just learn how to use Canva—you’ll learn how to create designs that solve real-world problems and meet industry standards.

Monetization Strategies: Many courses teach design, but few show you how to earn money with your skills. This course provides actionable steps to monetize your Canva expertise, turning your passion into profit.

Expert Guidance: Our instructors have years of experience in design and teaching. You’ll benefit from their insights, tips, and best practices.

Who Is This Course For?

This course is designed for anyone who wants to learn Canva and use it effectively:

  • Beginners who want to start designing with no prior experience.

  • Small Business Owners looking to create professional marketing materials without hiring a designer.

  • Freelancers and Entrepreneurs interested in offering design services or selling templates.

  • Students and Professionals aiming to enhance their design skills for career growth.

  • Content Creators and Marketers who want to elevate their social media and branding.

Course Modules at a Glance

Module 1: Introduction to Canva

  • What is Canva?

  • Setting up your account and navigating the interface.

Module 2: Canva Basics

  • Exploring the dashboard and template library.

  • Adding and editing text, images, and shapes.

Module 3: Intermediate Canva Skills

  • Advanced text techniques, photo editing tools, and special effects.

  • Using grids, frames, and layering for professional results.

Module 4–19: Real-World Projects

  • Design YouTube thumbnails, Facebook ads, Instagram posts, and more.

  • Create book covers, t-shirt graphics, and promotional materials.

Module 20: Monetize Your Skills

  • Leverage LinkedIn to showcase your portfolio and attract clients.

  • Explore additional platforms for earning through design.

What Makes Canva a Game-Changer?

Canva isn’t just a design tool—it’s a platform that empowers creativity. Its user-friendly features make it accessible to beginners, while its advanced capabilities cater to professionals. By mastering Canva, you’ll be able to:

  • Save time and money by creating your own designs.

  • Build a brand identity that sets you apart.

  • Offer design services to clients and generate income.

What You’ll Achieve by the End of This Course

By completing this course, you’ll:

  • Master Canva’s tools and features, from basic to advanced.

  • Create professional-grade designs for personal, business, and creative purposes.

  • Build a diverse portfolio of projects, including social media graphics, book covers, and merchandise designs.

  • Learn how to market your Canva skills and monetize your expertise.

  • Gain the confidence to tackle any design challenge and stand out in the competitive design world.

Are You Ready to Begin?

If you’re ready to unlock your creative potential, build practical skills, and start earning with Canva, this course is for you. Whether you want to design for fun, enhance your business, or kickstart a freelance career, this course will equip you with everything you need to succeed.

Enroll now and take the first step toward becoming a Canva expert. Let’s turn your creativity into a powerful skill—and a profitable one!

courseDetails.title: Excel from Zero to Pro - الإيكسل من الصفر للاحتراف
courseDetails.shortDescription: كورس الإيكسل الكامل بالعربية
courseDetails.longDescription:
عندما تنضم إلى دورتنا التدريبية في الإكسل، ستحصل على تجربة تعليمية شاملة تمنحك المهارات الضرورية لتحقيق النجاح في استخدام هذه الأداة القوية لإدارة البيانات والتحليل. سنقدم لك محتوى تدريبي غني يغطي جميع جوانب برنامج الإكسل ويتيح لك فهمًا عميقًا للمفاهيم والمهارات الأساسية والمتقدمة.


ستتعلم كيفية استخدام الإكسل في سياقات مختلفة وعلى نطاق واسع، من تنظيم البيانات وإنشاء جداول حسابات إلى إنشاء رسوم بيانية ديناميكية وتحليل البيانات بشكل فعال. سنركز على تطبيقات عملية وأمثلة واقعية لاستخدام الإكسل في مجالات مثل الأعمال والمالية وإدارة المشاريع.


ستتلقى توجيهًا خطوة بخطوة لتطوير مهاراتك، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولاً إلى الوظائف والتقنيات المتقدمة. سنعمل على تحسين قدراتك في استخدام الصيغ والدوال المدمجة وإجراء التحليلات الإحصائية وإنشاء تقارير متقدمة باستخدام الإكسل.


هذه الدورة في الإكسل مناسبة لطلاب الجامعات والمعاهد الذين يسعون لتعلم مهارات إدارة البيانات والتحليل، وكذلك للمحترفين في مجالات الأعمال والمالية الذين يحتاجون إلى استخدام الإكسل في إعداد التقارير واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن المحللين والموظفين الإداريين سيستفيدون أيضًا من هذه الدورة لتعزيز مهاراتهم في تنظيم البيانات وتقديم التقارير بشكل مؤثر. وأخيرًا، فإن رواد الأعمال سيجدون في هذه الدورة أدوات قوية لإدارة البيانات وتحليل أداء الأعمال لدعم نمو مشاريعهم واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية بنجاح.


استعد لتحقيق تقدم واضح في مهارات الإكسل واكتساب الثقة في استخدام هذه الأداة الرائعة للعمل والدراسة. احجز مقعدك الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو التفوق في استخدام الإكسل بثقة وكفاءة.
targetAudiences: المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في تعلم الإيكسل من الصفر
الطلاب والباحثين الذين يحتاجون إلى مهارات الإيكسل للدراسة والبحث
المهنيين في مختلف المجالات الذين يحتاجون إلى الإيكسل لأغراض العمل والتحليل
أصحاب الأعمال الصغيرة والمتوسطة الذين يحتاجون إلى إدارة بياناتهم وتقاريرهم
الموظفين الإداريين والمكتبيين الذين يستخدمون الإيكسل في أعمالهم اليومية.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Human Resources Expert Certificate: HR Metrics and Analytics by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

Course Author:

Dr. Yuliya Vershilo,

- 10 years as Head at Compensation & Benefits & general HR, GRP certified

- Developed and implemented large scale motivations platforms for different domains: IT, Corporate Banking, Retail Banking, Sales and Remote Channels / Contact Centers, Back Office at different banks, Including non-material motivation and EJM refactoring

- Developed and Implemented HR analytics frameworks

- Expert in HR market analysis and HR strategy developing and implementing

- Expert in HR automatization and digitalization

- Expert in budgeting and HR planning

- Expert in HR regulation


Human Resource Management | Saint Petersburg State University of Finance and Economics, 2005

Ph.D. in Economics| Saint Petersburg State University of Finance and Economics, 2009

International GRP Certification: Global Remuneration Professional | CBSD Thunderbird - World at Work, 2019

Grading Program | CBSD Thunderbird - World at Work, 2021

More than 20 years extensive experience in the field of HR management including:

  • Talent acquisition and selection.

  • Creating compelling Employee Value Propositions (EVPs),

  • Training and development,

  • Compensation and benefits

  • People analytics


Course Overview:

In fast-paced and data-driven world, the role of Human Resources (HR) has evolved significantly. No longer confined to administrative tasks, HR is now a key strategic partner, driving decisions that shape an organization’s future. One powerful tool that has emerged to support this transformation is HR Analytics. In this part, we will explore what HR Analytics is, why it matters, and how professionals can harness its power to make informed decisions.


What is HR Analytics?

HR Analytics, also known as People Analytics or Workforce Analytics, involves the application of data analysis techniques to human resources data. Its main goal is to provide insights that help organizations make better HR decisions, such as improving employee performance, increasing retention rates, and optimizing recruitment processes.

HR Analytics goes beyond merely collecting data; it uses statistical analysis, modeling, and machine learning to uncover patterns and trends that can impact the workforce. It’s about turning raw data into actionable insights.

HR Analytics is a transformative approach that enables HR professionals to contribute more strategically to their organizations. By leveraging data, HR teams can not only improve their operational efficiency but also align their efforts with broader business goals.

As organizations become more data-focused, professionals equipped with HR Analytics skills will be invaluable assets, driving better talent management, improving employee experiences, and ultimately contributing to the long-term success of the organization. Whether you’re just starting your HR journey or looking to enhance your expertise, mastering HR Analytics will open doors to new opportunities and help you stay ahead in the competitive HR landscape.


The Importance of HR Analytics for Organizational Success

In rapidly evolving business environment, companies are increasingly recognizing that people are their greatest asset. The success of any organization largely hinges on how well it manages, engages, and retains its workforce. This is where Human Resource analytics comes into play. By leveraging data-driven insights, HR analytics transforms traditional HR processes into more strategic, objective, and predictive systems. It can significantly enhance decision-making, drive employee engagement, and boost overall organizational performance.


1. Data-Driven Decision Making

HR analytics uses data to inform decisions. By analyzing data from recruitment, performance management, employee satisfaction surveys, and turnover rates, organizations can identify patterns and trends that would otherwise remain hidden. For example, data can highlight which recruitment channels provide the highest-quality hires or which departments are experiencing higher turnover rates and why.

This shift to data-driven decision-making enables HR departments to move beyond reactive measures and adopt a proactive approach. Instead of reacting to employee turnover, companies can use predictive analytics to identify early warning signs of disengagement, allowing for timely intervention. As a result, HR becomes a strategic partner in the organization, contributing directly to business outcomes.


2. Optimizing Recruitment and Talent Management

One of the key areas where HR analytics adds value is in recruitment. By analyzing historical hiring data, HR can identify the qualities and characteristics that predict future employee success, enabling more effective talent acquisition. This ensures not only that the right candidates are hired but also that they are placed in the right roles. HR analytics can help reduce hiring biases and improve diversity by relying on objective data to inform decisions.

Moreover, once employees are hired, HR analytics plays a crucial role in performance management. It can track employee progress, highlight skills gaps, and recommend training or development programs tailored to individual needs. This data-driven approach to talent management increases productivity and ensures employees are continuously aligned with organizational goals.


3. Enhancing Employee Retention and Engagement

High employee turnover is costly for any organization. Replacing employees involves recruitment costs, training expenses, and productivity losses. HR analytics can help reduce turnover by identifying patterns and factors that contribute to employee dissatisfaction and disengagement. Through employee surveys, exit interviews, and performance data, HR can pinpoint the root causes of turnover—be it inadequate compensation, lack of career growth opportunities, or workplace culture.

Analytics can also measure employee engagement levels across different teams or departments. By understanding what drives engagement and what doesn't, HR can implement targeted initiatives to improve job satisfaction, work-life balance, and overall workplace morale. This leads to higher retention rates, increased productivity, and a more committed workforce.


4. Strategic Workforce Planning

As businesses grow and adapt to market demands, workforce planning becomes a critical component of success. HR analytics helps organizations anticipate future workforce needs based on business trends, expansion plans, and attrition rates. With access to predictive models, HR can provide actionable insights into how many employees will be needed, what skills will be required, and where gaps may emerge.

By aligning workforce planning with overall business strategy, HR analytics ensures that organizations are prepared to meet future challenges. This approach also helps organizations manage costs effectively by avoiding overstaffing or understaffing, both of which can harm business performance.


5. Improving Compensation and Benefits Strategy

Effective compensation and benefits strategies are key to attracting and retaining top talent. HR analytics provides insights into market trends, allowing companies to stay competitive in their offerings. By comparing compensation data across industries and regions, organizations can ensure that their salary structures are competitive and fair. Additionally, HR analytics can track employee benefits usage, helping companies design benefits packages that align with employee preferences, thus increasing satisfaction without unnecessary spending.

HR analytics also plays a role in performance-based compensation, such as bonuses and incentives. By linking performance metrics to compensation, companies can ensure that high performers are rewarded appropriately, driving motivation and productivity.


6. Creating an Inclusive Workplace Culture

In recent years, diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) have become critical focal points for organizations worldwide. HR analytics can play a pivotal role in tracking DEI metrics, such as gender representation, pay equity, and promotion rates among different demographic groups. By analyzing this data, organizations can identify areas where they may be falling short in terms of inclusivity and take steps to address these gaps.

This leads to a more diverse and inclusive workforce, which research has shown to foster innovation, creativity, and better decision-making—ultimately contributing to organizational success.


7. Reducing Costs and Improving Efficiency

Beyond talent management, HR analytics can drive cost savings and operational efficiencies. By automating routine HR tasks, such as payroll processing, attendance tracking, and benefits administration, analytics helps streamline processes and reduce administrative overhead. This frees up HR professionals to focus on more strategic activities that add value to the business.

Additionally, HR analytics can optimize workforce scheduling, ensuring that the right number of employees are available at peak times, thereby reducing overtime costs and improving overall operational efficiency.


8. Supporting Business Strategy

Ultimately, HR analytics bridges the gap between HR and broader business objectives. By aligning people-related data with organizational goals, HR can demonstrate its contribution to the company's bottom line. Analytics provides a clear picture of how HR initiatives—such as recruitment, training, employee engagement, and compensation—are impacting key performance indicators (KPIs) like revenue growth, profitability, and customer satisfaction.

This shift transforms HR from a purely administrative function into a strategic partner that plays a critical role in driving business success. Organizations that embrace HR analytics are better equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, optimize their workforce, and achieve long-term growth.


Conclusion

HR analytics is a critical tool for any organization that aims to stay competitive in today's business landscape. By harnessing the power of data, HR can make more informed decisions, improve employee satisfaction and retention, and contribute to organizational success. Companies that invest in HR analytics not only enhance their ability to manage their most important asset—people—but also gain a competitive edge in their respective industries.

courseDetails.title: How to Not Lose Your Child to Substance Use
courseDetails.shortDescription: Parenting Strategies for Prevention, Communication, and Resilience in the Face of Substance Use
courseDetails.longDescription:
Substances are rampant, drugs, alcohol, marijuana, vaping, pills, and kids are coming online at an earlier age. You can’t do everything your child does, but you do possess the prerogative of helping provide the environment, the dialogue, and the relationship that best protects them.

This course will enable you to do the same, without fear, shame, nor tedious lectures.

________________________________________

Who It’s For

• Caregivers of children aged between 8–18 years

• Families that need effective prevention strategies before problems develop

• children who are anxious for school to start

•All who yearn for an increased trust relationship and remain connected despite the adolescent years

________________________________________

Contents

8 brief modules you may listen/view at your own leisure.

Each one includes:

•Scripted dialogue for seamless hard conversations

• Checklists for you to identify warning signs and track progress

• Sheet & templates for creating certain guidelines, online limits, & routines

• Age-specific tips for younger kids vs. teens

________________________________________

What You’ll Learn

At the end of this course you will be able to:

• Recognize risks and strengthen protective factors within your family

• Create an integrated relationship that facilitates trust and openness

• Discuss substances in a way that fosters dialogue rather than defensiveness

• Establish the guidelines, observe closely, and place online restrictions

• Spot early warning signs and respond calmly before risks escalate

•Oversee first essential 72 hours if use has begun

• Teach coping and resilience skills that compete with drive to use

• Make a long-range commitment with school, peers, and the community

________________________________________

Our Approach

This isn’t about fear. It’s about:

• Prevention science -- effective strategies that work at home

• Motivational interviewing — speaking in a way that maintains children's engagement

• CBT/DBT skills -- strategies for developing coping, problem solving, and resiliency

• Family-centered approaches—because relationships are the best protection

________________________________________

The Promise

You need not be a perfect parent in order to protect your child.

You need only be a present one.

courseDetails.title: Time Management and Timeboxing in Business, Projects, Agile
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Timeboxing and Time Management: Boosting Productivity and Efficiency in Business, Agile, Projects, Life.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Time Management and Timeboxing in Business, Projects, Agile by MTF Institute


Unlock your full potential and achieve peak productivity with "Time Management and Timeboxing in Business, Projects, Agile." This comprehensive course equips you with the essential skills and strategies to master your time, boost efficiency, and drive success in today's fast-paced professional landscape.


This course delves deep into the principles and practical applications of effective time management and the powerful technique of timeboxing. You'll learn to move beyond simply managing tasks to strategically managing your time and energy, enabling you to achieve your goals with greater focus and efficiency. We explore how these methodologies are crucial in business operations, project management, and agile environments, providing you with a holistic understanding of their impact across diverse professional settings.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 216 countries and has been chosen by more than 740 000 students.


Course Authors:

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Topic Overview:


  • Time Management:

    • This is the process of planning and controlling how you spend your time. Effective time management enables you to work smarter—not harder—so you get more done in less time, even when time is tight and pressures are high.

    • It involves prioritizing tasks, setting goals, and using strategies to increase productivity.

  • Timeboxing:

    • This is a specific time management technique where you allocate a fixed time period—a "timebox"—to a planned activity.

    • Instead of working on a task until it's finished, you work on it within the set time frame. This helps to create a sense of urgency and focus.

    • It's a way to combat procrastination and ensure that tasks are given adequate, but not excessive, attention.


Course Description: Time Management and Timeboxing in Business, Projects, Agile

Unlock your full potential and achieve peak productivity with "Time Management and Timeboxing in Business, Projects, Agile." This comprehensive course equips you with the essential skills and strategies to master your time, boost efficiency, and drive success in today's fast-paced professional landscape.

Course Overview:

This course delves deep into the principles and practical applications of effective time management and the powerful technique of timeboxing. You'll learn to move beyond simply managing tasks to strategically managing your time and energy, enabling you to achieve your goals with greater focus and efficiency. We explore how these methodologies are crucial in business operations, project management, and agile environments, providing you with a holistic understanding of their impact across diverse professional settings.


Curriculum Highlights:

Foundational Time Management Skills

This section lays the groundwork for effective time management, focusing on:

  • Understanding Time Management: Gain a clear understanding of the core concepts and principles.

  • Setting Clear Goals: Learn how to define and prioritize goals to drive focused action.

  • Planning and Organizing Your Time: Master the art of creating effective schedules and plans.

  • Overcoming Procrastination: Develop practical strategies to conquer procrastination and stay on track.

  • Managing Energy, Not Just Time: Discover how to optimize your energy levels for peak performance.

  • Evaluating and Adjusting Your Time Management Plan: Learn to continuously refine your approach for optimal results.

  • Interactive Activity: Eisenhower Matrix in Action: Apply the Eisenhower Matrix to real-world scenarios for effective prioritization.


Time Management and Timeboxing Guidelines

This section explores the intricacies of timeboxing and its application in various professional contexts:

  • Foundations of Time Management and Introduction to Timeboxing: Understand the core principles of timeboxing.

  • Mastering Timeboxing Fundamentals: Define, explore principles, and variations of timeboxing.

  • Timeboxing Techniques, Tools, and Effective Task Management: Learn practical techniques and tools for effective implementation.

  • Prioritization Strategies and Selecting Tasks for Timeboxing: Master the art of prioritizing tasks for optimal timeboxing.

  • Overcoming Timeboxing Challenges, Pitfalls, and Optimizing for Flow: Address common challenges and optimize your workflow.

  • Strategic Time Management and Timeboxing in Business Operations: Apply timeboxing to enhance business efficiency.

  • Time Management and Timeboxing in Project Management: Utilize timeboxing for successful project execution.

  • Timeboxing as a Cornerstone of Agile Methodologies: Understand the role of timeboxing in agile frameworks.

  • Advanced Time Management Frameworks and Digital Tools Ecosystem: Explore advanced frameworks and digital tools.

  • Implementing Time Management & Timeboxing: A Step-by-Step Guide and Case Studies: Learn through practical examples and case studies.

  • Conclusion: Your Ongoing Journey to Strategic Time Mastery: Develop a roadmap for continuous improvement.


Importance for Companies and Managers:

Developing these skills is crucial for both companies and managers for several reasons:

  • Increased Productivity:

    • Effective time management and timeboxing lead to higher productivity by minimizing wasted time and maximizing focused work.

    • For companies, this translates to increased output and efficiency.

  • Improved Efficiency:

    • By prioritizing tasks and allocating time effectively, managers and employees can streamline workflows and reduce unnecessary delays.

    • This helps companies to meet deadlines and achieve their goals more efficiently.

  • Reduced Stress and Burnout:

    • Proper time management helps individuals maintain a healthy work-life balance, reducing stress and the risk of burnout.

    • For companies, this means a happier, healthier, and more engaged workforce.

  • Enhanced Focus and Prioritization:

    • Timeboxing, in particular, encourages focused work by eliminating distractions and promoting single-tasking.

    • This helps managers and employees to prioritize critical tasks and avoid getting bogged down in less important ones.

  • Better Project Management:

    • Time management and timeboxing are essential for effective project management. They help to ensure that projects stay on schedule and within budget.

    • Managers can use these skills to allocate resources effectively and track progress.

  • Improved Decision-Making:

    • When managers have good time management skills, they are less likely to make rushed or impulsive decisions.

    • They can take the time to gather information, analyze options, and make informed choices.

  • Enhanced Team Collaboration:

    • When team members manage their time effectively, it improves collaboration and communication.

    • Timeboxing can also be used to structure meetings and ensure that they stay on track.

In essence, time management and timeboxing are not just individual skills; they are essential for organizational success. By fostering these skills, companies and managers can create a more productive, efficient, and sustainable work environment.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una página web para promocionar productos de Amazon Afiliados y genera ingresos por las ventas.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB PARA VENDER PRODUCTOS DE AMAZON Y GANAR COMISIONES POR LAS VENTAS?


El Programa de Afiliados de Amazon es un programa de marketing de afiliación que permite a las páginas web crear enlaces y ganar comisiones por cualquier venta generada a través de estos enlaces.


Proporcionarás a tus usuarios la seguridad de realizar sus compras en una página web de confianza y cuando lo hagan, ganarás entre un 3% y un 10% en comisiones por venta generada.

Además, podrás aprovecharte de las diferentes promociones, ofertas y novedades de Amazon para hacer más atractiva tu oferta. Unirse al Programa de Afiliados es completamente gratis y su uso es sencillo.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.

courseDetails.title: Breakup Grief: Heal After Heartbreak & Find Yourself Again
courseDetails.shortDescription: Use proven healing tools, self-reflection, and emotional resilience strategies to process pain, and release self-doubt.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Break up do something for you. Whether your breakup came out of the blue or was a long time coming, you’re left with unanswered questions, hurt feelings, and an overwhelming feeling of loss. But endings are not only closed doors, but there’s also space for new beginnings.


Breakup Grief: Healing after Heartbreak and Finding Yourself Again is a 6-module program whereby you can work from your pain while rebuilding your life. Each of the 6-modules combines therapy strategies, self-reflection questions, and guided practices that will always begin from your present place, still early on your grief journey or ready to step out facing your future with courage.


In this course you will uncover the path of celebrating your emotions, releasing self-doubt, and mapping out a confident image of the next life you aspire to. Think of it as a map and handbook: structured enough that you will follow its guidance, flexible enough that you will make go at your own pace. By the end of it you will feel not only stronger but capable, empowered and prepared for whatever lies ahead.


Your heartbreak may have altered your narrative but did not end it. In actuality, the most empowering thing is only just beginning.
targetAudiences: Individuals navigating the pain of a recent breakup or separation.
Anyone seeking emotional healing and self-discovery after heartbreak.
People who want to rebuild self-worth and confidence.
Those struggling with guilt, anger, or attachment to past relationships.

¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS, ELEMENTOR KITS Y ELEMENTOR PRO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


Los kits de plantillas de Elementor son plantillas de páginas disponibles como colecciones, centradas en un tema o tipo de sitio web específico. Los kits de plantillas se crean como un grupo de plantillas individuales para un sitio web específico.


Los creadores de sitios pueden utilizar kits de plantillas para páginas individuales de un sitio. Por ejemplo, un kit de plantillas de sitio web inmobiliario comprende plantillas para cada página que una empresa inmobiliaria convencional necesita y plantillas para componentes específicos, a saber, formularios de contacto , ventanas emergentes , pies de página, encabezados, etc.

courseDetails.title: Security Optimizer: Protege tu Sitio Web en WordPress 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo proteger tu sitio web en WordPress de ataques y vulnerabilidades con el plugin Security Optimizer.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Security Optimizer es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround para proteger un sitio web de WordPress y prevenir una serie de amenazas como ataques de fuerza bruta, inicios de sesión comprometidos, fugas de datos y más.


¿CUÁLES SON LAS CARACTERÍSTICAS Y BENEFICIOS DE SECURITY OPTIMIZER?

El plugin ofrece características como:

  • Evitar el malware común.

  • Defenderte contra los ataques de fuerza bruta.

  • Añadir protección XSS avanzada para proteger carpetas críticas y que no se inyecten archivos maliciosos.

  • Ocultar tu versión de WordPress.

  • Eliminar el archivo readme.txt predeterminado.

  • Proteger el inicio de sesión.

  • Habilitar verificación en dos pasos (con Google Authenticator).

  • Cambiar la URL de inicio de sesión.

  • Impedir usar «admin» como nombre de usuario.

  • Las actividades quedan registradas en el Activity log y además facilita funciones para reaccionar ante posibles ataques desde la sección «Acciones después de un hackeo» para:

    • Cerrar sesión automáticamente a todos los usuarios.

    • Obligar a cambiar las contraseñas.

    • Reinstalar todos tus plugins.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos mejoraremos la seguridad de su sitio web en WordPress con el plugin Security Optimizer, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web protegido de ataques y vulnerabilidades.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo instalar correctamente el plugin Security Optimizer.

  • Cómo revisar y configurar correctamente todos los módulos del plugin Security Optimizer.

  • Cómo configurar la seguridad de tu sitio web en WordPress.

  • Cómo configurar la seguridad para el acceso a tu sitio web de WordPress.

  • Cómo revisar las actividades que se realizan dentro de tu sitio web en WordPress.

  • Qué acciones realizar posteriores a una vulnerabilidad.

  • Cómo mejorar la seguridad de tu sitio web en WordPress.

  • Cómo proteger tu sitio web en WordPress de ataques y vulnerabilidades.

courseDetails.title: Practical Malware Analysis for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn basic static and dynamic malware analysis with easy to follow instructions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Discover the essential skills of malware analysis with our beginners friendly hands-on course on Malware Analysis. Master the Art of  Static and  Dynamic malware analysis Techniques. This course is perfect for beginners, covering static analysis, dynamic analysis, and advanced sandboxing provides a comprehensive foundation in cybersecurity.

The course provides all the necessary resources to help you learn malware analysis including Malware samples and presentations along with video lectures.

What You'll Learn:

  • Static Analysis Fundamentals: Learn to analyze malware code without execution, identifying malicious patterns and characteristics.

  • Dynamic Analysis Techniques: Execute malware in a secure environment to observe behaviour, understand impact, and identify threats.

  • Sandboxing Malware: Utilize online Malware Analysis sandbox to automate malware analysis in real time, enhancing your understanding of real-world threats.

Why This Course?

  • Hands-On Learning: Engage in practical exercises with real-world scenarios to build confidence and expertise in malware analysis.

  • Expert Guidance: Gain insights from experienced cybersecurity professionals through step-by-step instructions.

  • Career Advancement: Develop crucial skills in malware analysis, essential for a successful career in cybersecurity.

Malware analysis is crucial for cybersecurity professionals because it helps them understand the behavior and techniques of malicious software. By analyzing malware, they can identify vulnerabilities, develop effective defenses, and enhance incident response strategies. This knowledge enables them to protect systems, mitigate risks, and prevent future attacks, ensuring the overall security of digital environments.
targetAudiences: Students who like to get started on the career path to become malware analysts
Beginners who want to pursuit a lucrative career as Malware Analysts or Cyber security researchers.
Malware enthusiasts in general, and cyber security researchers who want to gain knowledge in cyber threats.

Su traductora, Milagros Parretta, posee amplia experiencia como Gestora de Proyectos y en trabajos de traducción e interpretariado de inglés a español y español a inglés. Ha dictado talleres y exposiciones en simposios y actualmente desempeña sus funciones con clientes alrededor del mundo.


La gestión de riesgos es el proceso de identificar, evaluar y controlar amenazas potenciales para una organización. Estas amenazas, o riesgos, pueden provenir de una amplia variedad de fuentes.

Aquí están los enfoques principales de la gestión de riesgos:

Identificación: Encontrar riesgos potenciales que podrían afectar a su organización o proyecto. Esto implica generar ideas, revisar problemas pasados y considerar lo que podría ocurrir en el futuro.

Evaluación: Determinar la probabilidad de que esos riesgos ocurran y cuán grave sería el impacto si ocurrieran. Esto ayuda a priorizar qué riesgos necesitan más atención.

Control: Tomar medidas para reducir la probabilidad de que los riesgos ocurran o para minimizar su impacto si lo hacen. Esto puede implicar cosas como establecer procedimientos de seguridad, comprar seguros o tener planes de respaldo.


¿Por qué es importante?

  • Minimiza las pérdidas: Al identificar y gestionar los riesgos, las empresas pueden reducir las pérdidas financieras, proteger su reputación y evitar problemas legales.

  • Mejora la toma de decisiones: La gestión de riesgos proporciona un marco para tomar decisiones informadas, considerando los posibles inconvenientes y oportunidades.

  • Mejora la resiliencia: Ayuda a las empresas a estar preparadas para eventos inesperados y a recuperarse rápidamente de contratiempos.

  • Aumenta la probabilidad de éxito: Al abordar los problemas potenciales de manera proactiva, las empresas pueden aumentar sus posibilidades de lograr sus objetivos.


Para los gerentes específicamente:

  • Protege a su equipo: Los gerentes son responsables de la seguridad y el bienestar de su equipo. La gestión de riesgos les ayuda a crear un entorno de trabajo seguro y a minimizar el daño potencial.

  • Genera confianza: Los empleados confían en los gerentes que están preparados y toman medidas para protegerlos de los riesgos.

  • Mejora el rendimiento: Cuando los riesgos se gestionan de manera efectiva, los empleados pueden concentrarse en su trabajo sin preocuparse por problemas potenciales.


En un mundo incierto, la gestión de riesgos es más crítica que nunca. Es una habilidad esencial para las empresas y los gerentes que desean prosperar frente a los desafíos.


¿Para quién es este curso?
No se requieren requisitos especiales. Un curso para cualquier persona que quiera desarrollar su carrera en negocios y riesgos.

Esto implica generar ideas, revisar problemas pasados y considerar lo que podría ocurrir en el futuro.

En un mundo incierto, la gestión de riesgos es más crítica que nunca. Es una habilidad esencial para las empresas y los gerentes que desean prosperar frente a los desafíos.

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Eğitimi | Başlangıçtan İleri Seviyeye
courseDetails.shortDescription: İleri Seviye Excel Kullanıcısı Olmak İçin A'dan Z'ye Her Şeyi (Tablolar, Grafikler, Formüller, Tasarımlar...) Öğrenelim!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Merhaba arkadaşlar,


Bu alanda sizlere Microsoft Excel kullanmanın avantajlarından bahsetmeyeceğim, şu an bu veya benzeri kursları inceliyorsanız böyle bir bilgilendirmeye ihtiyacınızın olduğunu düşünmüyorum ancak bu eğitimin içeriğine ve eğitimden maksimum fayda sağlayabilmek için uygulayabileceğiniz birkaç küçük bilgiye değinmek istiyorum.


Excel eğitim kursumuz, kurs içeriğinden de anlaşılacağı üzere teorik ve pratik kabiliyet kazandırıp öğrenme sürecinin pekiştirilebilmesi açısından tıpkı lise, üniversite ders müfredatlarında olduğu gibi belirli bir disiplin ve metodik sıralı hiyerarşiye bağlı kalarak hazırlanmıştır. Yani emeklemeden koşturmaya yönelik gereksiz ve zorlayıcı bir sürecin içinde olmayacaksınız.


Bununla birlikte kursumuz 28 saat uzunluğunda olup içinde 22 bölüm, 217 ders, 180 formül, +1.000 benzersiz bilgi, +1.000 örnek/genel tekrar, başlangıç ve bitiş aşamasında olmak üzere 2 adet Seviye Tespit Sınavı, 70 adet egzersiz dosyası barındırmaktadır.


Yine hem kurs isminden hem de içindekiler öğelerinden de anlaşılacağı üzere eğitim kursumuz, temelden yani başlangıçtan ileri seviyeye olmak üzere her seviyeye hitap edebilecek şekilde mümkün olduğunca basit ancak detaylı, aceleden uzak tane tane anlatım metodu benimsenerek hazırlanmıştır. Bu açıdan eğer iyi bildiğinizi düşündüğünüz bir ders veya konu varsa ilgili dersi pas geçmek de bir tercih olsa da bu yolu tercih etmenizi tavsiye etmiyorum. Her ne kadar derslerin açıklama kısmında ilgili derslerin içerikleri paylaşılmış olsa da dersin işlenme aşamasında farklı konu ve noktalara değinilmiş olabilir. Öte yandan hem bu tercih yerine (yani dersi izlemeden pas geçmek) hem de hem de video akışını kendi anlama ve öğrenme alışkanlığınıza uygun olarak kalibre edebilmek adına ders videolarının hızını arttırmayı ya da azaltmayı birinci seçenek olarak değerlendirmeniz yararınıza olacaktır.


Öğrenme sürecinize pozitif etki edebilecek bazı tavsiyeler de vermek istiyorum.


  • Konsantre olun. Ders videolarını izlerken konsantrasyonunuzu olumsuz etkileyecek faktörleri minimize etmelisiniz.

  • Not alın. Zorlandığınız veya karıştırdığınız noktalarda basit ve adım adım notlar almanız yazım esnasında da size tekrar etme imkanı vereceğinden etkili olacaktır.

  • Pratik yapın. Ders videolarının önemli bir kısmında pratik yapabilmeniz için ilgili derse ait egzersiz dosyaları bulunmaktadır. Hem bu dosyalar üzerinden hem de farklı kaynaklardan bulacağınız örneklerle bol bol pratik yapmanız öğrenme sürecinizin kısalmasına büyük katkı verecektir.

  • Farklı kaynaklardan da yararlanın. Yalnızca bu ders içeriğinde alacağınız bilgilerle yetinmeyin, farklı kaynaklar üzerinden de araştırma yapmanız, video izlemeniz hem tekrar etme ve pratik yapma imkanı sunacak hem de bilgi dağarcığınızı zenginleştirecektir.

  • Ders videolarının hızını arttırın. Ders videolarını izledikten sonra hızı arttırarak tekrar izlemek dersin pekiştirilmesi açısından önemli katkı verecektir.

  • Disiplinli olun. Bu aşamada size verebileceğim en önemli tavsiyem azimli ve disiplinli olmanızdır. Kendinize göre periyodik bir planlama yaparak düzenli bir biçimde dersleri izlemeniz, araştırmanız, azami derecede pratik yapmanız son derece önemlidir. Zira herhangi bir kaynaktan alacağınız bilgi hap niteliğinde değildir, takviyedir. Bu takviye ancak azim ve disiplin ile birleştiği takdirde öğrenme hızınızı ve becerinizi maksimize edecektir.


Excel kullanım kabiliyetinizin ileri seviye olarak değerlendirilmesi konusunda dünya genelinde kabul görmüş standartlar bulunmamaktadır. Bununla birlikte ileri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olmak için aslında öne çıkan iki parametre vardır; hız ve bilgi. Bu açıdan öncelikli hedefimiz bilgi birikimimizi arttırmak sonrasında ise bol pratik ile hızlanmak olmalıdır. İleri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olabilmeniz için bilginizi ve hızınızı arttıracak tüm girdileri bu eğitim kursumuzda bulabileceksiniz.


Öte yandan başlangıç ve bitiş sınavları ile birlikte kat ettiğiniz mesafeyi eğitimin sonunda kendiniz de görebileceksiniz.


Umarım keyifli ve faydalı bir eğitim süreci olur, sağlıcakla:)
targetAudiences: Microsoft Excel kullanımını öğrenmek ya da mevcut deneyimini/seviyesini ilerletmek isteyen herkes katılım gösterebilir.

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Dashboard Eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Birbirinden farklı ve açıklayıcı örneklerle başlangıçtan ileri seviyeye dashboard oluşturmayı kolayca öğrenin!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Merhaba arkadaşlar,


Günümüzde artık iş veya eğitim hayatımızın her anında verilerin toplanması, ayıklanması, analiz edilmesi ve anlamlandırılmasının önemi giderek artmaktadır. Bununla birlikte bu verileri analiz edip anlamlandırdıktan sonra hedef kullanıcıya estetik bir biçimde kolay ve açıkça ifade etmek de son derece önem taşımaktadır. Zira çalışma sonrası ortaya çıkacak ürün her ne kadar zengin bilgilerle dolu da olsa nihayetinde bir üründe ilk dikkati çeken şey iki unsur fiyat ve ambalajıdır. Bu nedenle “Vakit nakittir.” mottosu ile hem zamandan tasarruf ederek kendimizin ve hedef kullanıcının zamanı verimli kullanmasını sağlamalı hem de oluşturduğumuz içeriğin zenginliğine estetik katarak ambalajını dikkat çekici yapabilmek elzemdir.


Hazırladığımız bu dashboard oluşturma eğitiminde Pivot Tablo, Power Pivot, Power Query gibi enstrümanlarla toplanan verileri düzenlemeyi, sadeleştirmeyi ve anlamlandırmayı öğreneceğiz. Öğrendiğimiz bu çıktıları ise grafiklerle, şekillerle, renk armoni yaklaşımlarıyla görselleştirmeyi deneyimliyor olacağız. Edinimlerimizi formlar, aktivex denetimleri ve yapay zeka ile desteklenmiş VBA kodlarıyla, makrolarıyla daha keyifli, daha hızlı ve daha estetik bir yolculuğa dönüştürüyor olacağız.
